permafrost.tundra.server

Class ServiceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.ServiceHelper

  • public class ServiceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with webMethods Integration Server services.

      • create

        private static void create(java.lang.String packageName,
                           java.lang.String serviceName,
                           java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String subtype)
                    throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Creates a new service in the given package with the given name.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package to create the service in.
        serviceName - The fully-qualified name of the service to be created.
        type - The type of service to be created.
        subtype - The subtype of service to be created.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error creating the service occurs.

      • create

        public static void create(java.lang.String packageName,
                          java.lang.String serviceName)
                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Creates a new flow service in the given package with the given name.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The name of the package to create the service in.
        serviceName - The fully-qualified name of the service to be created.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an error creating the service occurs.

      • respond

        public static void respond(int code,
                           java.lang.String message,
                           com.wm.data.IData headers,
                           java.io.InputStream content,
                           java.lang.String contentType,
                           java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                    throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Sets the HTTP response status, headers, and body for the current service invocation.
        Parameters:
        code - The HTTP response status code to be returned.
        message - The HTTP response status message to be returned; if null, the standard message for the given code will be used.
        headers - The HTTP headers to be returned; if null, no custom headers will be added to the response.
        content - The HTTP response body to be returned.
        contentType - The MIME content type of the response body being returned.
        charset - The character set used if a text response is being returned.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • setResponseBody

        private static void setResponseBody(com.wm.net.HttpHeader response,
                                    java.io.InputStream content)
                             throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Sets the response body in the given HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        response - The HTTP response to set the response body in.
        content - The content to set the response body to.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • setResponseStatus

        private static void setResponseStatus(com.wm.net.HttpHeader response,
                                      int code,
                                      java.lang.String message)
        Sets the response status code and message in the given HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        response - The HTTP response to set the response status in.
        code - The response status code.
        message - The response status message.

      • setContentType

        private static void setContentType(com.wm.net.HttpHeader response,
                                   java.lang.String contentType,
                                   java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                            throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Sets the Content-Type header in the given HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        response - The HTTP response to set the header in.
        contentType - The MIME content type.
        charset - The character set used by the content, or null if not applicable.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the MIME content type is malformed.

      • setHeaders

        private static void setHeaders(com.wm.net.HttpHeader response,
                               com.wm.data.IData headers)
        Sets all HTTP header with the given keys to their associated values from the given IData document in the given HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        response - The HTTP response to add the header to.
        headers - An IData document containing key value pairs to be set as headers in the given response.

      • setHeader

        private static void setHeader(com.wm.net.HttpHeader response,
                              java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the HTTP header with the given key to the given value in the given HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        response - The HTTP response to add the header to.
        key - The header's key.
        value - The header's value.
